articles.description: You can download iOS 15.5 now, but here's what to know before you do.
articles.content: Apple's latest iPhone update, iOS 15.5, is here. After multiple beta iterations, the iOS update is now publicly available to download. The follow-up to iOS 15.4 offers a few small upgrades and improv… [+2491 chars]
